message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend a special offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000, allowing you to secure it without breaking the bank. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
